TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: 指定附加属性仅在一个元素上可浏览，该元素还具有另一个特定 .NET Framework 特性应用到其类定义。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 术语的含义`browsable`此说明中使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]类似于为提供的说明，但附加的属性的可浏览状态是专门针对的属性信息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，因为附加的属性是主要[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]仅应在附加的属性定义了 get 访问器上应用。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 不适用于此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]到 set 访问器。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 尽管它是正在进行的可浏览的设置操作的直观地[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]相关元素，它是存在性和 get 访问器上定义控制 true 行为的元素的属性的特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. 有关声明的附加属性的常规信息，请参阅[附加属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

param.name: attributeType
param.span: 为了在应用 的类上浏览附加属性，必须还对该类应用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的 。

span.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied..

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeType As Type
public: property Type ^ AttributeType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取必须同时应用在类上的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值仅可通过设置`attributeType`参数[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]构造函数。The value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 返回此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持基于通过此属性，公开的一个可能的设置值的多个可能的哈希值。This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, .
